column2: "Ahaha! It's really nice outside. The photon freshness is a different level compared to my office!"
"You don't look like an enemy... Great then I can use you as I please!"
"Right now I'm open to anything as I finally got free permission to this area!"
"Getting that permit took forever. Even if I tried to go I kept getting stopped \"it's too dangerous,\" they say."
"Trying to get my head around the notion that there's anything more dangerous than me is too vexing!"
"But finally getting it, I had no idea it would feel this good. I guess good things come to those who stick to it!"
"Guess I might get back to blowing up what ever I feel like!"
"Since I have 'free' rights to this area then I might just blow everything up!"
